DataElement.preferredName: Patient Blood Urine Assessment Day Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: a count of the number of days for which an individual has symptoms of blood present with discharge of urine.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: related to the examination by palpation or inspection of an individual for symptoms of presence of blood cells with discharge of urine.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: Blood circulating throughout the body.:The fluid that is excreted by the kidneys.  It is stored in the bladder and discharged through the urethra.:Examination of the body by auscultation, palpation, percussion, inspection, and olfaction.  (Taber's)

Concepts.definition: A liquid tissue; its major function is to transport oxygen throughout the body. It also supplies the tissues with nutrients, removes waste products, and contains various components of the immune system defending the body against infection. Several hormones also travel in the blood.
The fluid that is excreted by the kidneys.  It is stored in the bladder and discharged through the urethra.

A systemic evaluation of the body and its functions using visual inspection, palpation, percussion and auscultation. The purpose is to determine the presence or absence of physical signs of disease or abnormality for an individual's health assessment.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: signs that a person has a condition or disease. Some examples of symptoms are headache, fever, fatigue, nausea, vomiting, and pain(NCI).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours.:To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

Concepts.definition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
Determining the number or amount of something.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Indicate the number of days y
ReferenceDocuments.description: Indicate the number of days you saw blood
